title: Font that uses by VOLVO for model names
content:
Hi all,  
need to identity font that uses by VOLVO for model names.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106063526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/01_3644.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106063526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/02_6479.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106063526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/03_4028.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106063526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/04_5564.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106063526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/05_5518.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106063526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/06_5159.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106063526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/07_4086.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106063526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/08_4120.jpg)
  
Thanks in advance!
author: 4thfebruary

comments.content: I think it's done internally by the technical departement.
peter maybe you know any PDF or vector with this glyphs ?
Most ad agencies will get access to the car brands, but this stuff is usually not publicly available.
Thanks for the info, Miss Tiffany.
